channel.title: Mute
channel.description: Well, when i mute someone on my server, all they have to do is relog and they will be unmuted. is there a way to actually make this last 48 hours, or 24 hours, or how ever long i want? :confused:

item.title: Mute
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

yea there is, though i dont think i could do it lolâ€¦ just get the current time and day, and have the variable save to a file, like an extra info file or something, then have it check next time they log in if its 2 days after when they got muted, if so then un mute.

Read full topic
